Summary

We are seeking an experienced Atlassian Administrator to manage, configure, and optimize our Jira, Confluence, and Jira Service Management (JSM) environments. This role is critical in ensuring our teams can collaborate efficiently, manage workflows effectively, and provide seamless IT service management. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in Atlassian administration, workflow automation, integrations, and best practices for Agile, ITSM, and Knowledge Management. This role may be performed remotely for the right candidate.

Compensation

$85K to $100K, + 10% yearly bonus


Duties and Responsibilities

Jira Administration (Software & Service Management)

Configure, customize, and maintain Jira Software and Jira Service Management (JSM) to meet business needs.
Proficiency in Jira Service Management (JSM) for handling security and ITSM workflows.
Develop and optimize workflows, issue types, fields, permissions, screens, and notification schemes.
Manage JSM request types, SLAs, automation rules, and approvals.
Implement and maintain Jira automation to streamline processes.
Support Agile development teams with Scrum, Kanban, and SAFe configurations.
Manage Jira integrations with other tools (e.g., CI/CD pipelines, Microsoft Teams, and third-party apps).

Confluence Administration

Maintain and enhance Confluence spaces, templates, and permissions to support knowledge management.
Develop and enforce content organization best practices to improve documentation accessibility.
Integrate Confluence with Jira and other tools to support project collaboration and ITSM processes.

System Maintenance & Security

Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high availability and reliability of Atlassian applications.
Manage user access, roles, and group permissions following security best practices.
Perform regular backups, upgrades, API integrations, performance optimizations, and plugin management for Jira, Confluence, and JSM.
Enforce governance policies to maintain a scalable and secure Atlassian environment.

Process Improvement & Automation

Identify and implement workflow automations to enhance efficiency for development, operations, and support teams.
Create dashboards, reports, and filters to improve visibility into team performance and key metrics.
Develop training materials and provide user support and training for teams using Jira and Confluence.
Qualifications & Requirements
3+ years of experience administering Jira, Confluence, and Jira Service Management in a mid-to-large enterprise environment.
ITIL Foundation Certification (for ITSM best practices)
Atlassian Certified Confluence Administrator (ACP-520: Confluence Space Administration)
Atlassian Certified Jira Administrator (ACP-120: Jira Administration for Cloud) (ACP-620: Managing Jira Projects for Cloud)
Atlassian Certified Expert (ACE)

Preferred Certifications

Excellent communication skills with the ability to work with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Strong troubleshooting skills and ability to analyze system logs, diagnose issues, and optimize performance.
Basic scripting knowledge (e.g., Groovy, Python, or PowerShell) for advanced automation is a plus.
Familiarity with Atlassian Access, Guard, Compass, Insight Asset Management, and CMDB integration is a plus.
Experience integrating Atlassian products with third-party applications (e.g., CI/CD tools, identity providers, monitoring tools, and ITSM solutions).
Proficiency in Jira Query Language (JQL) and automation rules.
Strong knowledge of Confluence structure, macros, and integrations.
Experience with Jira Service Management (JSM), including SLAs, request types, portals, and ITSM best practices.
Deep understanding of Jira administration, workflow automation, DevOps workflows, issue types, permissions, and custom fields.
Working Conditions

Must be able to perform essential job duties. Work is performed primarily in an office environment. Typically requires the ability to sit for extended periods of time (66%+ each workday), hear the telephone, and enter data on a computer and may also require the ability to lift up to 10 pounds.
